category: friendship, grow, growth, hardship, hurt, inspire, lessons, let-go, life, life-lessons, move-forward, pain, painful, raw, real, release, self-love, self-worth, truth

quote: The struggle to leave the cocoon is what strengthens the butterfly’s wings so she can fly. I am about to become something beautiful.
author: Tricia Stirling, When My Heart Was Wicked

quote: Despite our disapproval with what God allows us to endure, he still remains the same God that is not interested in our convenience, as much as our character.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: annoyance, character, cruelty, disappointments, enduring, enduring-in-style, frustration, god, growth, hard-lessons, judgement, rising-above-it

quote: I have gotten where I am today by refusing to stay where I was. Change is something I have done over and over again.
author: Danielle Bernock, Emerging with Wings: A True Story of Lies, Pain, and the Love That Heals
category: bravery, change, courage-in-life, growth, inspirational, tenacity

quote: Even when life knocks me around, I will not lose hope. For you see, nothing is ever personal Just a chance for me to grow.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: growth, inspirational, inspire, life-lessons, quote-of-the-day-mindset, quotes, woman

quote: i see the sky as beautiful, Regardless of its shine Because I wake each day grateful, That I get another chance to be alive.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Resistance makes a man think new thoughts he never considered before. It makes a man ask questions he never asked before. It makes a man seek answers he never sought before. It makes a man beg God for help that he never before realized he needed. These quests, quests of the heart and soul, eventually make a man deeper, wider, taller.
author: Randall Arthur, Wisdom Hunter

quote: A true man will treat a woman how she treats herself, you can't expect to be a queen when your disrespecting your own crown.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Some believe to be spiritual, is to be always loving and shit... Being spiritual is taking no shit, by believing that your voice deserves to be heard if the deed is not satisfying your soul.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: awaken, beautiful, concious, growth, inner-voice, life, spiritual, voice, woman

quote: carry your wounds with pride, Believe in yourself; amongst greatest of catastrophe' You grew into the being you are And I think that in itself, is certainly enough.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: awakening, believe, growth, growth-quotes, life-lessons, life-quotes, pride, spiritual

quote: Gandhi is an example of a man who grew from being self-centered as he was learning to become a lawyer in England, to becoming more family- and social oriented in South-Africa, where he led a reformation of Indian rights, to becoming determined in helping his nation recover from British rule at which he succeeded in the end with the help of a great many people. At the end of his life Gandhi was increasingly focused on a larger picture, encasing the whole world in his vision of a peaceful future.
author: Gudjon Bergmann, Living in the Spirit of Yoga: Take Yoga Off the Mat and Into Your Everyday Life

quote: I am weary of this notion of faithfulness to a point of view at all cost. Life around us is ever changing, and I believe that one should try to change one’s slant accordingly—at least once every ten years. The great heroic devotion to one point of view is very alien to me—it’s a lack of humility. Mayakovsky killed himself because his pride would not be reconciled with something new happening within himself—or around him.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: I sat and asked God a question, never before now had I felt he was truly listening; Or was it i, that disrupted his appearance... Why God, must the treasures of our world be hard done by and the enemies of life become greater in their scheme of manipulation? Oh dear one, I chose the strong ones to hand the deepest lessons, because I know they can handle it and soon enough they will too. The ones that twiddle their thumbs and become ignorant to what's their truth; will attract what they are and continue in the circle of vicious greed. They'll eventually grow, like you did too. It may just take time, and your time now is bettering your existence from the struggle you've faced.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: awareness, clarity, depth, energy, god, growth, life, presence, spiritual, victory

quote: Breaking away from old psychological memes requires a Herculean effort in many cases. In essence, we are outgrowing a worldview while maintaining a relation-ship of sorts. Transcending an ideology can feel like going through a divorce and having to stay friends because of the kids.
author: Gudjon Bergmann, More Likely to Quote Star Wars than the Bible: Generation X and Our Frustrating Search for Rational Spirituality

quote: You must learn to give, from sufficiency, not only take, from neediness.
author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quote: Masters of flight don't learn to fly because of all that helped them, they learnt to fly, despite all that tried to stop them.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: awakening, beauty, concious, growth, life-lessons, master

quote: Growth seems to evolve from a narrow-minded, constricted worldview (selfish) to an ever-more-encompassing worldview (multiperspective caring). To put it simply, the more self-centered you are, the lower you tend to land on these scales, while the more perspectives you can entertain—the more empathy you can show and the better your ability to see things from a variety of viewpoints—the higher you land on these scales.
author: Gudjon Bergmann, More Likely to Quote Star Wars than the Bible: Generation X and Our Frustrating Search for Rational Spirituality

quote: I'm enjoying getting to know me, one lesson at a time.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: beauty, growth, journey, quote-of-the-day, quotes, selflove

quote: They swore by concrete. They built for eternity.
author: Günter Grass

quote: I have awaited a storm that should deliver me, pluck me away and now it has come softly, even without my knowledge. But it is here. While I was despairing, thinking everything lost, it was already quietly growing. I had thought that division was always an end. Now I know that growth also is division. And growth means relinquishing. And growth has no end.
author: Erich Maria Remarque

quote: Feeling uncomfortable is the first step towards growth.
author: L.K. Elliott, Confessions of an Ex Hot Mess

quote: there is a silent beauty hidden amongst pain, if you sit in it you may never find it; if you grow through it, You'll find the treasure.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: existence, growth, inspiration, journey, lifelessons, pain, road-to-happiness, soul-search, transformation, truth

quote: Love me only for my actions, and I will grow stressed. Love me only for my body, and I will grow paranoid. Love me only for my words, and I will grow bitter.Love me only for my soul, and I will grow.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: growth, love, love-me, soul, spiritual, true-love, unconditional-love

quote: there's something about trauma to the mind, body and soul. One day your normal and the next your different; you don't know what changed but you know nothing's the same and all of a sudden you are learning to adapt yourself to the same environment with a whole new outlook. I guess you realise your not invisible and every aching bone bleeds it's sorrow through anguish in your movements. One day it'll get easier, because I'm telling myself it will and that's the difference between becoming a pioneer through this disaster when all thought I'd be a slave to pity.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: car-accident, empower, empowerment, growth, healing, life, rehabilitation, transformation, trauma

quote: dont harden your heart; because of the past, it'll block your sight, of a positive future.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: awaken, awareness, growth, inspiration, inspire, love, positivity, transformation

quote: That we are bound to the earth does not mean that we cannot grow; on the contrary it is the sine qua non of growth. No noble, well-grown tree ever disowned its dark roots, for it grows not only upward but downward as well.
author: C.G. Jung, Dreams

quote: Today, I don't want to ask for anythingI just want to give thanks for Everything I already have.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: appreciation, awaken, empower, gratitude, growth, life, thankyou

quote: The possibility to love another scared me; terrified me actually. Being a free spirit, apart of me is most alive when roaming, than I became a mother and for the first time I felt my heart live outside my body and that's the moment his laughter became my medicine.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: You are never as good as you think you are, and you are never as bad as you believe yourself to be.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Learning to Live through Jiu Jitsu

quote: There is no higher calling than service to your fellow man, and to do so through your own personal mastery of a craft is a gift enjoyed by few. Cultivate this gift, and give it away.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Learning to Live through Jiu Jitsu
category: giving, growth, jiu-jitsu, mastery, service, teaching

quote: Jiu Jitsu is a vehicle for self-discovery and growth. It reminds me of my ego, of my insecurities, and of my shortcomings.
author: Chris Matakas

quote: Do more than just exist
author: create to inspire!
category: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: He who didn't succeed at his own dreams, was too busy listening to another's failures.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: dreams, growth, inspiration, life-lessons, success, surroundings

quote: I train Jiu Jitsu because I recognize that I am a piece of the whole, and as I grow so does that which contains me. The whole of man advances with the growth of a single individual. Every life I influence is benefited from the fact that I have devoted such a large portion of my life to this pursuit. I will be a better husband, father, and whatever other future roles I may hold because of my time in this sport. In making me a better man, I know that society as a whole is improved.
author: Chris Matakas

quote: Reclined legs don't get fed, they get limp like boiled spaghetti. Walk it out!
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"
category: build, create, energize, growth, laziness, personal-development, produce, work

quote: Jiu Jitsu gives me an ideal to strive toward. Technical mastery lies on an infinite continuum and completion of this skill is impossible. Every time I train I have something that I can improve upon, and this will hold true for each and every training session that lies between me and my grave.
author: Chris Matakas

quote: I would more appropriately define mastery as the technical ability possible within the constraints of your particular existence. It must be noted that this is a subjective definition, and that this degree of mastery would be individual to each of us.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Learning to Live through Jiu Jitsu
category: bjj, growth, jiu-jitsu, martial-arts, mastery, success

quote: Rather than whinge on how another has treated you, give a thought to what it is your upset with? Is It really them or is it yourself.. Did they cross a boundary or have you not set one? Did they communicate rudely or are you not listening intently. We so often blame, because it's easier than to confront our vulnerable selves. But the truth is, no one can make you feel inferior if you do not give them the power!
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Like a wild flower; she spent her days, allowing herself to grow, not many knew of her struggle, but eventually all; knew of her light.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: i think through it all, the hardest part was un-attaching myself to the ones I thought would stay around forever. People change and life changes with it, you've got to fight like mad for everything you love and let go with ease for everything that isn't fitting for you anymore. It is apart of maturing your soul, you attract what you need for that stage of your life, and you grow, as people change and so does life.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: beauty, change, empower, growth, road-to-ruin, transformation, wisdom, wise, woman

quote: We become extremely vulnerable to the ones that love us, we believe in what they say, we believe in their faith held next to us. It's law of attraction to become who your surrounded by, so instead of focusing of changing another, find some one suitable to your soul.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: A moment can change the way you view the world, and the way you view the world will give you more moments.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: gratitude, growth, inspire, life, love, quotes, truth

quote: Slush is frozen over. People say that winter lasts forever, but it's because they obsess over the thermometer. North in the mountains, the maple syrup is trickling. Brave geese punch through the thin ice left on the lake. Underground, pale seeds roll over in their sleep. Starting to get restless. Starting to dream green.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson, Speak

quote: Tomorrow when you wake up, be aware of how you dress your thoughts and emotions, because at the end of the day no matter what you look like, if your inner being isn't beautiful, neither are you.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: awareness, goddess, growth, know-self, knowledge, lessons, spiritual

quote: And even if you cared what they had to say, would you act upon their opinions and create your life from it? No. Than stop replaying their toxic words in your head, it's no good for your being and start doing the things that once made you, you.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: awaken, be-yourself, growth, let-go, renewal, spiritual, stay-true

quote: When 'Dirty Mack' salts your flow, get beyond feelings of hurt, anger, bitterness, and especially vengeance. Be glad, and take refuge in knowing light has been cast on the shadow of hatred, envy or jealousy that has mocked your shine. And press forward with your purpose - allowing time and space to clear the way for karmic justice on your behalf.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"
category: anger, bitterness, dispute, divine-justice, energy, envy, growth, hate, hatred, healing, jealous, jealousy, justice, karma, karmic, negative, positive, progress, prosper, prosperous, shadow

quote: We're all a little broken, it's how we feed our brokenness that defines us; some you wouldn't believe ever broke and some you will see never grew through the break but one thing certain, everyone is a little broken, it's how we feed our brokenness that defines us.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: I remember sitting back, on a local beach I called home; thinking about the wild storms I had already faced, the chaotic thunder I somehow learnt to dance through. This time, remembering it, was different. I had no emotional attachment, I felt free of the past and could quietly seperate who I was with who I am now and this moment was empowering , because had I not faced the greatest disasters with courage, I wouldn't have learnt the mastery of life. My self awakening.
author: Nikki Rowe, Once a Girl, Now a Woman

quote: don't let someone rearrange your path because they lost sight of their own.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: She always had that about her, the sparkle in her eye, she was unshakeable and what made her so admirable was; her ability to shine bright when no one knew of her pain.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: become, growth, life-lessons, pain, rise, she-quotes, woman

quote: There isn't much art to writing, you just feel; feel everything deeply and somehow transform your lessons into a magical piece of work that will help someone else's heartache.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: I find it boring and a waste of time debating other people’s opinions, however challenging my own is always intriguing and there is where I inevitably discover growth.
author: Carl Henegan, Darkness Left Undone

quote: Preaching vs Teaching:The difference between preaching and teaching: one makes you feel good, the other makes you grow.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"
category: empowerment, feel, feelings, good, goodness, grow, growth, preacher, preaching, teacher, teaching

quote: people give themselves away so freely, and we can't be lesser to them for this, we've all experienced density in which we've honoured another's journey before our own, and they too, like us will start to believe that they hold a rare infectious gift by being their 100% self. When they realise this, they won't waste another moment giving away apart of them they fought so hard to find.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: growth, inner-being, inner-enrichment, life-lessons, spiritual, woman

quote: Your potential for growth is directly proportionate to the degree to which you are willing to make mistakes.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Learning to Live through Jiu Jitsu

quote: She didn't struggle and so she didn't grow
author: Paulo Coelho
category: death, girl, girls, growth, life, strong-women, struggle, suicide, women

quote: No matter how old I get, I keep running into people who are smarter, nobler, and kinder. I really ought to start listening to them and telling my pride to shut up. I had gods tell me not to go to Asgard. I had witches tell me not to go to Flagstaff. You told me this plan wouldn't work. But I barreled ahead anyway for my own reasons. I still have plenty of growing to do.
author: Kevin Hearne, Tricked

quote: Never violate the sacredness of your individual self-respect.
author: Theodore Parker

quote: When you enter a mindset, you enter a new world. In one world--the world of fixed traits--success is about proving you're smart or talented. Validating yourself. In the other--the world of changing qualities--it's about stretching yourself to learn something new. Developing yourself.
author: Carol S. Dweck

quote: I believe that man is here to grow into the fullest, the best that he can be. At least this is what I want to do. As I am growing to become whatever I become, this will just come out on the horn. Whatever that's going to be, it will be. I am not so much interested in trying to say what it's going to be. I don't know. I just know that good can only bring good.
author: John Coltrane

quote: Hope floats but effort propels.
author: Rob Liano
category: effort, goals-in-life, growth, hope, hopeful, inspiration, inspirational-quotes, momentum, motivation, motivation-for-living, motivational-quotes, motivational-quotes-for-women, motvational, rob-liano

quote: Without appreciation (for yourself, others and life itself) there is no growth
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru
category: acceptance, appreciating-others, appreciation, appreciation-quotes, embracing-life, growth, life-wisdom, progress, quotes-on-acceptance, quotes-on-appreciation, rasheed-ogunlaru, rasheed-ogunlaru-quotes, self-acceptance

quote: Thousands of hopeful days came to naught before this one. This was a golden day. Never give up.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: days, determination, effort, growth, hold-on, keep-at-it, never-give-up, perseverance, persist, resolve, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, struggle, success, try, winning

quote: When you fall so many times, you become the master of flight.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: growth, growth-quotes, life-ans-living, life-quotes, master-life-lessons, powerful, truth, truth-quotes, understanding

quote: They say if you're a better person today than you were yesterday you're well on the road to perfection. So I figure if I'm a real snot today, tomorrow I should make huge progress.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich
category: better-yourself, growth, improvement, life-quotes, perfection, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: Sometimes our inability to be Christlike happens because... we don't care. But sometimes it happens because we are naïve about our own hidden darkness.
author: MaryKate Morse, Making Room for Leadership: Power, Space and Influence

quote: Comparison kills...There will always be someone ahead of you and someone behind you in life...When you see someone behind you...feel blessed for you are ahead of them...When you see someone ahead of you...feel inspired for your own growth...Compare yourself to YOU of yesterday, if that's what you like to do...so you can become better today !
author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

quote: Small but growing is better than big and stuck.
author: David Waweru, Champion

quote: Life is full of lessons for the success-minded person who keeps his/her eyes open to what is going on.
author: John Patrick Hickey

quote: Somewhere along the journey i lost myself; i learnt to be who they told me to be, i lived that girl for decades until their truth showed me; the words they were preaching didnt match the the steps they were walking, so i was done with their opinion and went on my unique way.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: be-free, game-change, growth, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, noble, quote-of-the-day, quotes-and-sayings, success, truth, truth-quotes, unique

quote: focus your intention on what your building, not whats already fallen away.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: awaken-within, believe, energy, focus, growth, intention, journey, let-go, love-quotes, release, renewal, spiritual

quote: A person has all sorts of lags built into him, Kesey is saying. One, the most basic, is the sensory lag, the lag between the time your senses receive something and you are able to react. One-thirtieth of a second is the time it takes, if you are the most alert person alive, and most people are a lot slower than that. Now Cassady is right up against that 1/30th of a second barrier. He is going as fast as a human can go, but even he can't overcome it. He is a living example of how close you can come, but it can't be done. You can't go any faster than that. You can't through sheer speed overcome the lag. We are all of us doomed to spend the rest of our lives watching a movie of our lives - we are always acting on what has just finished happening. It happened at least 1/30th of a second ago. We think we are in the present, but we aren't. The present we know is only a movie of the past, and we will really never be able to control the present through ordinary means. That lag has to be overcome some other way, through some kind of total breakthrough.
author: Tom Wolfe, The Electric Kool-Aid Acid Test
category: 60-s, 70-s, acid, enlightenment, growth, lsd, psychedelics, spiritual, spirituality, tripping

quote: Broken by hardships, disappointments and tragedy, people can become discouraged and cynical. But lives can also be mended. Put back together well, they won't be just like they were before. Damaged pieces reassembled with a golden bonding of patience and love will help form a person into an exquisite masterpiece. It is as if people have to be broken before they can become whole and complete.
author: Steve Goodier
category: adversity, brokenness, growth, healing, improvement, potential, problems, purpose

quote: she will change the world someday, her cure of love in a world gone mad; is the gentle kind of touch that will teach women to grow and men to rise.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: change, depth, empowerment, gentleman, growth, inspirational, love, madness, search, women

quote: we can only flourish when we are truly grounded in self. keep that in mind when journeying.
author: Alexandra Elle

quote: The greatest disaster of self; comes not with experience of failure, but the fear gained belief; about what you think you cannot achieve
author: Nikki Rowe, Once a Girl, Now a Woman
category: believe, change, growth, letgo, mindset, selfempowerment, surrender, transform

quote: i love the moments i lost a little faith, spirit would always remind me; it was just a bad day.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: In the heart of every apple is an entire orchard waiting only to be planted.
author: Thorstan Osborne

quote: Manifestation is like a flower, you must put so much intent into its energy before you can sight its beauty.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: beauty, empowerment, flower, growth, growth-life, intention-quotes, manifestation, self-love, spiritual, succeeded, success

quote: Our talents are living things, we give birth to them, nourish them till they grow and become immortal.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: artistry, birth, brain-power, brilliance, eternity, flair, forever, genius, growth, immortal, immortality, infinite, infinity, knack, legacy, living-things, nourishment, nurture, nurturing, subtle, talent, talents, touch, wisdom, wit

quote: Seed Leaves Homage to R. F. Here something stubborn comes,Dislodging the earth crumbsAnd making crusty rubble.it comes up bending double,And looks like a green staple.It could be seedling maple,Or artichoke, or bean.That remains to be seen.Forced to make choice of ends,The stalk in time unbends,Shakes off the seed-case, heavesAloft, and spreads two leavesWhich still display no sureAnd special signature.Toothless and fat, they keepThe oval form of sleep.This plant would like to growAnd yet be embryo;In crease, and yet escapeThe doom of taking shape;Be vaguely vast, and climbTo the tip end of timeWith all of space to fill,Like boundless IgdrasilThat has the stars for fruit.But something at the rootMore urgent that the urgeBids two true leaves emerge;And now the plant, resignedTo being self-definedBefore it can commerceWith the great universe,Takes aim at all the skyAnd starts to ramify.
author: Richard Wilbur
category: birth, growth, life, nature, perfection, poetry, potential

quote: Nothing is lost that cannot be refound" she says in a voice infused with otherworldly authority "this is the Dark Goddess's promise to guide you back to your deepest self and soul. If you choose this Sarah, so will it be.
author: Karen   Clark

quote: I sat with the broken; I whispered their names, I let them feel for the first time; serendipity, would change the vision they see for a day
author: Nikki Rowe
category: growth, healer, humanity, prophet, saviour, teacher, unite, whisper, wisdom

quote: It was painful to contemplate the distance between the future of accomplishment I'd imagined for myself twenty years earlier, and the reality...it was painful to understand that the cushion of exceptionality invoked by the drug had made me oblivious to my inertia. And it was painful to have to define myself again, at an age when most people are happy in their own skins.
author: Ann Marlowe
category: addiction, addiction-recovery, aging, growth, healing, mental-illness, recovery

quote: Your life is your teacher and whatever comes to you is the work of your soul. Things are never as they appear on the surface. Your lessons are woven into your losses and challenges and only you can figure out what they mean and allow them to change you.
author: Karen   Clark

quote: Motivation is desire or inspiration. A motive is a reason. What's your reason?
author: Rob Liano
category: accountability, desire, desire-quotes, growth, inspiration, life, love, motivation, motivational-quotes, reason, success

quote: Of the obstacles we face while traversing life, the most challenging are often the ones we create from within and project onto our path.
author: Glenn A. Maltais

quote: It’s sometimes difficult to align our wants with our needs, for old programing and new paradigms vibrate at very different levels.
author: Glenn A. Maltais

quote: You can no longer hide from me. I am your soul ache come to guide you home.
author: Karen   Clark

quote: When we assign ourselves the mission of changing others who show no want or need to change, it blocks our spirit-it drains us-and prevents us from attracting into our lives that which we need to grow.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: We sometimes just have to let things be.There are times in life that things happen, and we just cannot control them. There are times when we don't want things to happen, but they do. Things that we don't want to know, we learn. Times in which people we can't live without, we have to let go.The greatest learning is accepting what has, what is, and what will be. Remaining focussed on where we want to go, and how we want to get there. It might not go the way we planned, or the way we hoped it would be. No one said life would be easy, but at least we keep trying, and working hard at making it the best life it can be.
author: Aisha Mirza
category: growth, inspiration, inspirational-quotes, islamic-quotes, life-lessons, self-awareness, words-of-wisdom

quote: we all get waves of regret sometimesbut instead of dwelling on what you can’t change,start focusing on what you can.
author: Alexandra Elle

quote: As you develop, the people around you also develop. As you progress, the world progresses with you to a certain degree.
author: Choa Kok Sui, Creative Transformation - The Golden Lotus Sutras on Spiritual Practice

quote: Sometimes the best journeys are those, that start when we do not plan, continue how we do not expect and are taking us places we do not know.
author: Aisha Mirza

quote: One who is hungry for growth, doesn't requires motivation and training.. He just needs an opportunity...
author: honeya
category: corporate, corporates, growth, hunger, hungry, motivation, motivational-quotes, opportunity, sales, sales-quotes, sales-skills, sales-training, sell, selling-skills, training, wise-words

quote: Grow in a way without losing much of our inner childlike deep senses embracing truthful, pure, simple relief of appreciation and gratitude.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul
category: appreciation, gratitude, growth, innocence, inspirational-living, simplicity

quote: If not love, what?
author: Rob Liano
category: affection, growth, growth-process, life, love, love-thoughts, loving, romance, romance-love, romance-love-teens

quote: You can grow softly, lovely and delicately amidst the hard surfaces. Not all who passed tougher times in life have a hard heart, kindness and tenderness do breathe despite of worse times.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul
category: adversity, attitude, character, difficulties, growth, tenderness

quote: You can either grow or degenerate. Either of these is happening all around you, all the time. There is nothing called a "safe comfort zone". This is a convenient name depicting the process of degeneration.
author: Manoj Arora, Happiness Unlimited: How to be happy always

quote: If you wish to give chance on others' abilities and capabilities then give them respected time to grow and express themselves.Share a path for everyone to grow and glow!
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul
category: abilities, appreciation, capabilities, generosity, growth, respect, skills, talent

quote: Have the capacity to adapt to change, it's your healthy growth, intelligently and emotionally.Our life can be full of extrinsic surprises, your flexibility is a key when you accept changes.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul

quote: Happiness is in all of us and it comes from progress. The root cause of a multiplier effect or a destroyer effect lies inside of us. The multiplication of the happiness in us on a daily basis makes us unique and powerful and gives us the reason for our existence." --Bimal Shah.
author: Bimal Shah

quote: I can feel my life changing and I’m not ready.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
author: Miranda J. Barrett, A Woman's Truth: A Life Truly Worth Living

quote: Some people say readin too many books will stunt your growth.
author: Henry Dumas, Echo Tree: The Collected Short Fiction of Henry Dumas

quote: You have to do your own growing, no matter how tall your grandmother was.
author: Miranda J. Barrett, A Woman's Truth: A Life Truly Worth Living

quote: The ability to live in a stable, safe environment that gives us the opportunity to create, grow and nurture our talents is sadly denied to many in the world today. I am proud to be able to say – as a leader – I can offer this to my people.
author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quote: Habits are familiar and comfortable, putting our reactions on autopilot and often leading us, instead, to great discomfort.
author: Charles F. Glassman
category: comfort-zone, growth, habit-quotes, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, personal-growth

quote: My body is a political battlefield.It is a place of war, of death and suffering, of triumph and victory, of damage and repair, of blood and tears and sweat.It is a place where memories go to find purpose for their existence.It is a place where humans cast all inhibitions aside to discover what exists at their very core.It is a place of growth wearing a mask of destruction.It is a challenge, not for the faint of heart, beckoning us to face it with eyes wide open.The only war is within. When you are ready to fight it, the field awaits.
author: Agnostic Zetetic
category: battle, battlefield, body, body-shame, challenge, destruction, field, growth, humanity, inhibition, internal, lgbt, overcoming, politics, pride, spiritual-warfare, survival, trans, transgender, triumph, war

quote: There" is not your dream, "here" is.. To create it, to become it and to live in it. The journey of your triumphs and setbacks are apart of the process now,stop getting ready to get ready and start living in the essence of your movements NOW.
author: Nikki Rowe, Once a Girl, Now a Woman
category: growth, journey, positivity, purpose, self-empowerment, soul, transformation, understanding

quote: A life I didn't choose chose me.
author: Wally Lamb, We Are Water

quote: All money does with an empty heart is allow you to be miserable in style.
author: Stefan Molyneux

quote: Sometimes violence cannot be stopped no matter what we do. But the more peaceful we are, the better chance we have of bringing out the peace in those around us.
author: Judith Orloff, Second Sight

quote: If at the moment when someone cuts us off in traffic or breaks our heart or begins bombing our ancestral village, we could withdraw from judging mode, and enter this other, more accepting mode, we could paradoxically, make ourselves more powerful. By resisting the urge to reduce, in order to subsequently destroy, we keep alive - if only for a few seconds more - the possibility of transformation. -The Thought Experiment
author: George Saunders, The Braindead Megaphone

quote: When you have a distaste for what is not yours, you have set the stage for what is yours.
author: Paul Enenche

quote: Any fight in life whether it is physical, mental, moral, or spiritual, how long you stay in the fight is highly dependent on your growth.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership
category: fight-in-life, growth, mental, moral, persistence, physical, spiritual

quote: Life is funny. We all have periods of ups and downs. Of silence and discovery. And then we begin to know who we are. Like watching a rose opening. Ah, we say. And once we do, the love and the wonder truly begin.
author: Erin Kouvas

quote: Another great example of the power of vulnerability -- this time in a corporation -- is the leadership approach taken by Lululemon's CEO, Christine Day. In a video interview with CNN Money, Day explained that she was once a very bright, smart executive who "majored in being right." Her transformation came when she realized that getting people to engage and take ownership wasn't about "the teling" but about letting them come into the idea in a purpose-led way, and that her job was creating the space for others to perform. She chracterized this change as the shift from "having the best idea or problem solving" to "being the best leader of people.
author: Brené Brown, Daring Greatly: How the Courage to Be Vulnerable Transforms the Way We Live, Love, Parent, and Lead

quote: When intent is rooted in pure love, you dreams will grown and manifest faster than you could ever imagine.
author: Dawn Gluskin
category: dreams, growth, imagine, intent, intention, love, manifest

quote: Change what you can, accept what you can't, and be smart enough to know the difference.
author: Wally Lamb, We Are Water

quote: When we are in touch with our creativity, through passion and excitement, we always put ourselves in the most expansive state of consciousness. Fear slows down our development, while love supports a rapid growth.
author: Raphael Zernoff
category: consciousness, development, growth, love, self-awareness, self-empowerment, self-help, spirituality, support, wisdom

quote: I have stretch marks on my heart.
author: Bella Bloom

quote: We should invest on our personal development not only to outgrow challenges but also maximize every opportunity that comes on our way.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: He who fears a positive purposeful change fears growth.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, The Untapped Wonderer in You: Dare to Do the Undone

quote: Life is more than not dying. Every living creature is born; it grows and dies. The pattern is the same, regardless of the span allotted. You build between the beginning and the end. What you build is yours. Nothing else is.
author: Tom Deaderick, Flightpack

quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet; This is not done by jostling in the street. -William BlakeThis admirable couplet should be posted in conspicuous places all over England. The truth it embodies is threatened by two parties of opinion: on the one hand by those who hold it as a sin against nature to try and control the increase of population in any way and on the other by those who believe in 'growth', the pursuit at all costs of a standard of living which entails more and more industrialization and urbanization. If the believers in nature have their way, England will in the end be so full of people that they will be jostling each other even on mountains: if the believers in 'growth' have their way, the whole country will be covered with streets and we shall hardly be aware that mountains exist.
author: David Cecil, Library Looking-Glass: A Personal Anthology

quote: If you cannot be open-minded, then you do not possess your ideas, your ideas possess you.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life
